title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.2 - Physical examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4212.2 - Physical examinations

State Regulations

All jockeys and exercise boys shall undergo examinations
whenever directed by the steward to determine their fitness to ride and the
reports of such examinations, duly signed by the examining physicians, shall be
filed promptly with the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4212.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
